name: Brutal Doom: Black Edition
summary:
"Brutal Doom: Black Edition" is a dark, serious, realistic and meaningful vision of the original Brutal Doom.

The mod follows the serious, evil and creepy atmosphere of original Doom franchise: "Black Edition" combines large battles and speed of classic Doom with a meaningful realism, the dark and atmospheric aesthetic of Doom 3 and the dynamics of modern stuffs found in Doom 2016.
